RestConnector.Title: Organic SEO visibility
RestConnector.HelpText: The SEO Visibility is composed of search volume and the position of ranking keywords. Each position is individually measured by a calculated factor by Searchmetrics. Also, the SEO Visibility factors in whether the ranking keywords are navigational or informational.

Text.Title: Url
Text.HelpText: URL for which the SEO Visibility is determined. The Visibility can be queried for a domain, a subdomain or a directory. For a domain, subdomain or directory all belonging sub-pages are included in the calculation.

JsonPath.Title: Absolute change
JsonPath.HelpText: The absolute change in the visibility in comparison to the previous week.

JsonPath.Title: Relative change
JsonPath.HelpText: The relative/percentual change in the visibility in comparison to the previous week.

JsonPath.Title: Backlink page
JsonPath.HelpText: URL on which the backlink was found.

JsonPath.Title: Title
JsonPath.HelpText: Page title of the page on which the backlink was found.

JsonPath.Title: Link text
JsonPath.HelpText: Anchor text.

JsonPath.Title: External links
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of links on the backlink page that go to external pages.

JsonPath.Title: Internal links
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of links on the backlink page that go to internal pages.

JsonPath.Title: Total links
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of links on the backlink page.

JsonPath.Title: Searchmetrics page strength
JsonPath.HelpText: Searchmetrics calculates for each page the page strength from the weighted backlinks that point to this page. A page with many links is given a high Searchmetrics Page Strength (SPS); a page with no or only a few links a low SPS.

JsonPath.Title: Link position
JsonPath.HelpText: All links on the backlink page are numbered in order of appearance. This number therefore reflects the position of the link on the backlink page. "1" is the first position. The higher the number is the lower is the position of the link.

JsonPath.Title: Link target
JsonPath.HelpText: Target URL of the link.

JsonPath.Title: Tag
JsonPath.HelpText: Link type (text/image/javascript/iframe etc.)

JsonPath.Title: Country code
JsonPath.HelpText: Country code of the server location of the backlink page.

JsonPath.Title: Country
JsonPath.HelpText: Country name of the server location of the backlink page.

JsonPath.Title: City
JsonPath.HelpText: City of the server location of the backlink page.
